thread.section_title: Colorado Pen Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colorado Pen | www.coloradopen.com
thread.title: DAVID F. Surprise, AZ
thread.title_full: Colorado Pen reviewed by DAVID F. Surprise, AZ

author: DAVID F. Surprise, AZ
title: DAVID F. Surprise, AZ
text: Always a great experience shopping with Colorado Pen! Tons of great deals, and customer service the way it used to be!! If your looking for great deals on a fantastic range of fine writing instruments, then look no further. I just purchased a Waterford Lismore Roller Ball, and pencil that normally would sell for $550, for $165. Tell me that's not an amazing deal!!
